proposal: Diving into the world of Nexus Chain, it's clear you're setting a new pace with Ethereum compatibility, low gas fees, and a unique gas payment model. Congrats on reaching 490 holders in the ETH network! 🎉 If you're looking to further engage your community, why not let them deploy their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery? Our tools are designed to align with visions like yours, making blockchain more accessible and rewarding for everyone involved. Let's make scalability and efficiency more than just buzzwords.
